parameters.name: allowAutoPump
parameters.description: Does the balloon continue to pump while holding the button down? 1=yes,0=no

parameters.name: life1
parameters.description: Mean breaking point for the first balloon type

parameters.name: life2
parameters.description: Mean breaking point for the second balloon type

parameters.name: life3
parameters.description: Mean breaking point for the third balloon type

parameters.name: trialsperset
parameters.description: Number of balloons in each set.

parameters.name: phase1
parameters.description: Whether to use the Phase-1 style trials (mixed)

parameters.name: phase2
parameters.description: Whether to use the Phase-2 style trials (blocked)

parameters.name: minpumps
parameters.description: Whether to add one 'free' pump to each balloon, so it never pops on the first pump.
